title: Embedded Generative AI in Enterprise Workflows: The Future of Productivity
description: Enterprises are increasingly adopting generative AI (genAI) to enhance their communication and productivity. Recent findings suggest that by 2025, nearly all enterprises will integrate genAI into their workflows. While standalone genAI tools have their merits, embedding this technology directly into existing enterprise applications offers a more seamless and user-friendly experience.
